author: jhgoh
body:
This PR updates the RPC time resolution parameter for the link board upgrade scenario in Phase-II.

The intrinsic time resolution of already installed chambers are known to be ~1.5ns, therefore the default parameters for the LB upgrade should be consistent with it.
There are other changes in the default parameter set (timeJitter and timeResolution), but they are not used in the actual simulation with precise timing, but we update them to avoid unnecessary confusions.

@bapavlov
title: Update RPC time resolution parameters
